title: The Witch, the Cat and the Water Dragon
description: This is the sequel to The Witch, the Cat and the Egg (2010)Juliane is a young witch who has been given the important task of guiding travellers through the magical Forest of Ennyar. A few months before, sheâ€™d been entrusted with taking a very special egg across the forest. The last magical water dragon has now hatched. As Juliane and the dragon will learn, a dark energy is rising in the forest, but not all is as it seems. Friendship and courage will be required to face the unknown, and help save magic.
author: Joanne Lecuyer
